page.title: 02Shopping in Coulby Newham.
page.content: The shopping facilities in Coulby Newham are poor at present. A few shops are dotted about in the estates of Ash Hill, Fox Howe, Thistle Rise and Hollowfield Square where you can buy daily needs but for other things you have to go to Middlesbrough. The nearest chemist is at{Marton,}where a small but busy shopping centre has a number of different shops and services including a snack bar and a Chinese take_away. However, a shopping centre is being built in Coulby Newham and will open in the Spring of 1986. Called the{Parkway Centre,}it will contain a Presto supermarket, 22 other shops, a social club, a public house and a leisure centre. There will be car parks which will take 565 cars, a covered shopping mall and special parking spaces for trolleys and cycles.
